description:
"The Survival Game Club is disbanded." Miou`s suden announcement has the members at a loss.
Urara ends up stuck to the outer wall of the third floor for certain reasons.
Momoka discovers a model gun worth a million yen in the club room.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ascension?! Silent Survival / The Unkillable Twin Tail / Crusade: Ragnarok of Angels and Demons
L`ascension ? Jeu de survie zen – La Miss à couettes veut mourir – Guerre sainte : Le Ragnrök de l`ange et du démon
Shouten!? Shizuka Naru Survival / Shi ni Zokonai Twin Te / Seisen: Tenshi to Akuma no Ragnarok
昇天!? しずかなるサバイバル / 死にぞこないのツインテ / 聖戦--天使と悪魔のラグナロク
